This strategy aims to test the waters and see if Bob is willing to negotiate without immediately pushing him away.

* **Positive Tone:**  I use positive language to maintain a friendly and collaborative negotiation.

This counteroffer aims to find a middle ground and hopefully reach an agreement.  I'm still willing to negotiate further if needed, but I'm not willing to drop much lower than $10,500.
